title: Compare Parthenon and White Temple--arch. forms

content.question: The Parthenon and the White Temple at Uruk both included which of the following architectural features?

choices.label: A sacred cella that contained votive figures or cult statues
A peripteral colonnade that housed an open-air market
A polished marble exterior that reflected the sunâ€™s divine light
A processional staircase that restricted access to the inner sanctum

content.answer: A sacred cella that contained votive figures or cult statues

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
